SELECT MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PW , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_NICKNAME , MEMBER_TELL , MEMBER_ADDR , ADDR_DETAIL , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_ROLE , MEMBER_STATUS , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE FROM SHOP_MEMBER
WHERE UPPER(${searchType}) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchValue})||'%'
ORDER BY MEMBER_ROLE, REG_DATE

SELECT MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PW , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_NICKNAME , MEMBER_ADDR , MEMBER_TELL , ADDR_DETAIL , MEMBER_EMAIL , DECODE(MEMBER_ROLE, 'MEMBER', '회원', '관리자') AS MEMBER_ROLE , DECODE(MEMBER_STATUS, 'ACTIVE', '활동중', '탈퇴') AS MEMBER_STATUS , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE FROM SHOP_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
